metadata.title: MILSIM.AI | Command Your Battlefield
metadata.description: Tactical airsoft community platform with real-time battlefield awareness

eventCommand.title: Event Command
eventCommand.description: Create and manage airsoft operations with full control. From small skirmishes to large-scale milsim events, command every aspect of the mission.

geofencedZones.title: Geofenced Zones
geofencedZones.description: Define operational boundaries with precision GPS. Set spawn points, objectives, and restricted areas with meter-level accuracy.

tacticalHud.title: Tactical HUD
tacticalHud.description: Real-time battlefield awareness at your fingertips. Track objectives, team status, and mission timers in an intuitive heads-up display.

squadTracking.title: Squad Tracking
squadTracking.description: Monitor allied positions across the field. Coordinate movements, assign waypoints, and maintain tactical cohesion in real-time.

missionObjectives.title: Mission Objectives
missionObjectives.description: Dynamic objectives that drive the action. Capture points, extraction zones, and timed missions keep every operator engaged.

outro.title: Ready to Command?
outro.description: Join thousands of operators using MILSIM.AI to elevate their airsoft experience. Plan missions, track teams, and dominate the battlefield.
